Description: Small Nile silt vase, exterior coated with red slip with black top and well burnished; small flat base, convex sides and raised rim.
Curator's comments: Black top red ware B62b in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery (1921). Grave discussed in W.M.F Petrie and A.C. Mace, Diospolis Parva, London (1901), p.33
